customer_reviews.title: A must have for any reptile keeper
customer_reviews.text: If you are keeping reptiles, especially diurnal, this device is a must have. It will also save you a lot because you will be replacing your UVB bulbs when their output really drops, instead of having to replace them once every few months. With this device, for example, I have found that my 20W Zilla brand UVB10 bulb was as good as new after a year and a half of daily use, whereas a Chinese MH bulb, with which I had high hopes, produced zero UVB.
customer_reviews.author: Vahe Ganapetyan

customer_reviews.title: My Bearded Dragon is much happier!
customer_reviews.text: This is well worth the money! i have adjusted the lights in my creatures terrarium to accommodate the lighting requirements. I was surprised when his colors started to really pop! A must have for anyone with creatures that need UV light.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Driscoll

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I needed this meter to read the UVB bulbs for my iguanas. It works perfectly. I was on the fence about which meter to buy, but I opted for the cheaper version than buying the 6.5-R. This does the job if you know how to read the meter (which is easy - look it up online).

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money!
customer_reviews.text: Every reptile keeper should have a Solarmeter. It was pricey to dish out, but definitely worth it to make sure husbandry is on point. My only complaint is I wish the sensor was on the face of the meter, instead of the top, to take readings a few inches closer to the substrate.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use, includes case and battery. Accurate!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, simple one-button use - measure effectiveness of UVB bulbs and keep your reptiles happy. It's also great when purchasing new bulbs and testing the quality or aging bulbs. Hint - brand name burbs really ARE better. Includes carrying/storage case and 9v battery. Also instantly does readout on the UV index.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C. Drew

product_meta.title: Solarmeter Model 6.5 UV Index Meter - Measures 280-400nm with Range from 0-199.9 UV Index
product_meta.description: Size:1-(Pack)Solar meters are compact, handheld radiometers with simple pushbutton operation and NIST-traceable accuracy. They're proudly made in the USA. The Solar meter Model 6. 5 UV Index Meter provides instantaneous UV index measurement, and is also used for UV index comparison, monitoring reptile lamp intensity and aging, monitoring UV lamp intensity and aging, and UV index tracking over time. To operate your Solar meter, aim the sensor window located on the top panel of the meter directly at a UV source. Press and hold the push-button switch on the face of the meter and read the results in UV Index on the LCD screen. For best results take note of the distance the reading was taken from the UV source in order to ensure repeatable results. A 9V battery is included, along with a rugged carrying case and Calibration Certificate.
feature_bullets: High Accuracy Measurement of the UV Index
